statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -15 \\ -5 \\ -20 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
